entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25 except 18 along the Fundy coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thundershower late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 25 except 18 along the Fundy coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023
